metadata.description: Structured task database for enhanced project management with hierarchical organization, dependencies, and status tracking

project_status.phase: Phase 1 Complete + Phase 2 Advanced Features + P3 Task Expansion

priority_definitions.critical: P0 - Must complete before any other work
priority_definitions.high: P1-P2 - Core functionality and technical debt

status_definitions.blocked: Cannot proceed due to external dependency
status_definitions.planned: Future task, dependencies not yet met

phase_1.title: Core Financial Management
phase_1.description: Native macOS application with comprehensive transaction management, dashboard analytics, and glassmorphism UI

phase_2.title: Secure Data Aggregation, Multi-Entity & Line Item Splitting Foundations
phase_2.description: Advanced line item splitting with percentage allocation across tax categories, analytics engine, onboarding flows

phase_3.title: Advanced OCR, Investment Tracking & Collaborative Workspaces
phase_3.description: Apple Vision framework OCR, multi-market investment portfolio tracking, role-based access control

phase_4.title: Wealth Dashboards, Real Estate Analysis & Financial Goal Setting
phase_4.description: Net wealth reporting, CoreLogic integration, advanced analytics

phase_5.title: Predictive Analytics, Scenario Modeling & Automated Financial Advice Engine
phase_5.description: AI-powered financial planning and automated compliance monitoring
